name: SoccerSketch
short_description:
CREATE DRILLS

You can choose from 120 different vector images to create your own drill. These high quality drills will illustrate your training in a perfect way. Like nothing else!

EXPORT DRILLS

After you have created your drill go ahead and export it as a high quality JPEG file. In a wink of an eye you have converted your drill in a lightweight file. After that you can use it for presentations, for your own archive or just share it with your friends.

PRINTER FRIENDLY

You want to have a nice and clear looking drill, which is easy to print. Switch the printer friendly mode on. This allows you to have a black and white background.

LOAD AND SAVE

Save your created drill as a ssdf file. This file format is especilly created for SoccerSketch. It contains all the information, which are required for
further tweaks and re-export.
summary: Soccer sketch is the perfect application for ambitious coaches
